title: Hike a trail at Skyline Drive
author: Jordan Ballard
body: I took my wife and 3 sons on a beautiful hike at Big Meadows, which is off of Skyline Drive in the George Washington National Forest.  It cost about $15 to get into the park, and it was about a 30 minute drive to get to the meadows from the entrance of the park.  We were even able to bring a stroller on the trail, which was great because the hike was pretty long so when one of our sons got tired we could put him in the stoller for a bit.

comments.author: Samantha Lynn
comments.body: I've been there, it was amazing! I also took my children and we had a great time! I would highly recommend going there and look forward to going again soon!

comments.author: Andrea Sharp
comments.body: I've never been there but have friends who have and they said it was amazing.  I really want to go!
